description:
Tree felling and pruning in the Tufnel Park Conservation area.

Conifer T1, Fell
Horse Chestnut T2, reduce back to previous points on secondary pollard. 
Horse Chestnut T3, reduce back to previous points on secondary pollard. 
Horse Chestnut T4, reduce back to previous points on secondary pollard. 
Horse Chestnut T5, reduce back to previous points on secondary pollard. 
Horse Chestnut T6, reduce back to previous points on secondary pollard. 
London Plane T7, reduce back to previous points on secondary pollard. 
London Plane T8, reduce back to previous points on secondary pollard. 
Silver Birch T9, 15 % crown reduction and deadwood.

All trees are located on the property of 73 Anson Road, Islington.
decision_conditions: The council expects to see a replacement tree planted in a location close to the Conifer that is to be removed, but further from the boundary wall to prevent damage in the future. The species and size is to be agreed with the Tree Preservation Officer prior to planting. Replacement tree is be planted within one planting season.
